title: To live till you die
creator_credit: Robert Morgan, J.C. Sheers, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, Rediffusion, Australian Broadcasting Commission and National Educational Television
brief_description: Explores the problems of old age and retirement in two different societies. 83-year-old Olivia is placed in an old people’s home in Sweden’s welfare state, in contrast to the great grandfather of the southern Italian Filazzola family, who still plays a part in supporting the family.
